data.event: In the spring of 1838, Howe sent Sidney Gambia, an agent, to Enterprise to sell goods and develop the settlement.

event.title: that year, to such an extent that is became

data.event: However, Enterprise was heavily-ladened with illness that year, to such an extent that is became known for it.

event.title: was officially recorded as the Town of Hamilton in 1844

data.event: Eventually the town was sold to Sidney Gambia for $1 (and for other terms), and the name was officially recorded as the Town of Hamilton in 1844.
